wikipedia_page.main: Richard Davison (born 20 September 1955) is an Olympic standard dressage rider. At the 2012 Summer Olympics he finished 26th in the individual Grand Prix special dressage, riding Artemis.Davison was the British Team captain at the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing. He also represented Great Britain at the Olympic Games in Athens in 2004, Sydney in 2000 and Atlanta in 1996.His eldest son, Tom Davison, is a renowned equestrian coach across Europe and the US, he is responsible for the coaching and training of Davison and the team of horses. His youngest son, Joe Davison, competes the family's show jumping horses.
